Abdul Majeed Dauda

He was born on the 9th of Juy, 2005 at New Atuabo, a suburb within the Tarkwa-Nsuaem Municipality. His father is Alhaji Daud (Chief Imam of New Atuabo).

Career

He started his footballing career with No Weapon FC.

He had his basic education at Tarkwa Islamic JHS.

He had his Islamic education at Ummul Qura.

He is a founding member of the Islamic Golden Eleven where he mostly feature as a central or attacking midfielder.

He enjoys playing FC25 Games at his leisure time.
